Add your own device
---------------------

The current version supports following stream sources:

#. USBamp
#. BioSemi
#. SmartBCI
#. StreamPlayer
#. openvibeSignal
#. openvibeMarkers
#. NE-EEG


You could add your own device in the following path by adding a
new 'elif' block.


    .. code-block::

       lib\neurodecode-master\pycnbi\steam_receiver
